おなかの話をしてんじゃないわよ！
google_translated:
With shaved ice
I'm not talking about my stomach!

en_text: Didn't you say you wanted\Nto be Miss Himemiya's friend?
jp_text:
君だって 姫宮さんと友達に
なりたいんじゃなかったのか？
google_translated:
You can be friends with Himesumiya-san
Didn't you want to be?

en_text: Whatever do you mean?
jp_text: 幹こそ彼女が好きなんでしょ？

en_text: Well...
jp_text: （薫）その…

en_text: You're right!
jp_text: 白状なさい！

en_text: Maybe I should have made some\Ntakoyaki for dinner instead...
jp_text:
（アンシー）夕食は
たこ焼きのほうがよかったかしら
google_translated:
dinner
It was better for Takoyaki

en_text: I'll go with you.
jp_text: （薫）僕も行きます

en_text: A piano...
jp_text: ピアノだ

en_text: That's the song you always play.
jp_text: あなたが いつも弾いてる曲だわ
google_translated: It's a song that you are always playing

en_text: Wow. I didn't know she\Ncould play the piano.
jp_text: へ〜え 姫宮ってピアノ弾けるんだ
google_translated: Himeko Himesomiya can play the piano

en_text: The same tone as\Nmy little sister's...
jp_text: 妹の音色と同じだ
google_translated: Same as the tone of my sister

en_text: That sunlit garden...
jp_text: あの“光さす庭”だ

en_text: I've found it.\NMy "shining thing."
jp_text: （薫）見つけた 輝くものを！

en_text: Himemiya! You have to\Nplay the piano for Mickey!
jp_text:
（ウテナ）姫宮　ミッキーのために
ピアノを弾いてあげなよ
google_translated:
for Hime Miyamiyamiyamiya Mickey
Don't play the piano

en_text: He seems to think your playing\Nhas a special feeling in it.
jp_text:
何だか 彼 君のピアノに
特別な思い入れがあるようだし
google_translated:
Somehow my piano
It seems that there is a special relationship

en_text: If you say so, Miss Utena.
jp_text:
（アンシー）ウテナ様が
そうしろとおっしゃるなら

en_text: No, don't do it because I say so.\NDo it for Mickey's sake.
jp_text:
（ウテナ）いや 僕が
言ったからじゃなくて
google_translated:
No, I
It was not because I said

en_text: I am the Rose Bride. I must do the\Nwill of whomever I am engaged to.
jp_text: （アンシー）私は薔薇の花嫁
google_translated: I am a bride of a rose

en_text: Mickey, wake up! This isn't the\Nway to get her to play for you!
jp_text:
（ウテナ）
目を覚ませよ ミッキー！

en_text: Next time,\Non Revolutionary Girl Utena:
jp_text: 次回「少女革命ウテナ」…

en_text: The absolute destiny Apocalypse.
jp_text: （アンシー）絶対運命黙示録(ぜったいうんめいもくしろく)
